TITLE: Automatic Docker Installation Using Official Script
DESCRIPTION: This snippet downloads the official Docker installation script and executes it with sudo permissions. It provides a quick and easy way to install Docker on Debian systems.
SOURCE: https://github.com/frozengee/compose/blob/main/docker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com -o get-docker.sh
sudo sh get-docker.sh
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Docker with Official Script
DESCRIPTION: Command to install Docker using the official installation script from get.docker.com.
SOURCE: https://github.com/frozengee/compose/blob/main/[10] Rockchip/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_39

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com | bash
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Service Dependencies in Docker Compose
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to configure service dependencies in Docker Compose using depends_on directive. Demonstrates dependency order for web, db, and redis services.
SOURCE: https://github.com/frozengee/compose/blob/main/compose.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
version: "3.7"
services:
  web:
    build: .
    depends_on:
      - db
      - redis
  redis:
    image: redis
  db:
    image: postgres
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Docker with Azure China Mirror
DESCRIPTION: Command to install Docker using the official script but with Azure China mirror for faster downloads in China.
SOURCE: https://github.com/frozengee/compose/blob/main/[10] Rockchip/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_41

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com | bash -s docker --mirror AzureChinaCloud
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Docker Registry Mirrors
DESCRIPTION: Script to configure multiple Docker registry mirrors for faster image downloads in China by editing the daemon.json file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/frozengee/compose/blob/main/[10] Rockchip/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_44

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
#- 终端命令添加 Docker 镜像加速
#- 以部分镜像加速为例
#- 以下是一整条命令，一起复制到终端运行

# 清空 /etc/docker/daemon.json 文件，准备写入新内容
echo >/etc/docker/daemon.json

# 使用 cat 命令将以下内容写入 /etc/docker/daemon.json 文件
# 配置 Docker 镜像加速器，使用多个镜像源来提高镜像下载速度
cat >/etc/docker/daemon.json <<EOF
{
"registry-mirrors": [
"https://docker.1panel.live",
"https://k-docker.asia",
"https://docker.1ms.run"
]
}
EOF

# 重启 Docker 服务以使配置生效
systemctl restart docker
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: 配置Docker国内镜像加速
DESCRIPTION: 通过修改Docker配置文件设置多个国内镜像加速源，以提高Docker镜像下载速度。脚本清空原配置文件，写入新的镜像仓库配置，并重启Docker服务使配置生效。
SOURCE: https://github.com/frozengee/compose/blob/main/[10] Rockchip/01.友善cm3588/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
#- 终端命令添加 Docker 镜像加速
#- 以部分镜像加速为例
#- 以下是一整条命令，一起复制到终端运行

# 清空 /etc/docker/daemon.json 文件，准备写入新内容
echo >/etc/docker/daemon.json

# 使用 cat 命令将以下内容写入 /etc/docker/daemon.json 文件
# 配置 Docker 镜像加速器，使用多个镜像源来提高镜像下载速度
cat >/etc/docker/daemon.json <<EOF
{
"registry-mirrors": [
"https://docker.1panel.live",
"https://k-docker.asia",
"https://docker.1ms.run"
]
}
EOF

# 重启 Docker 服务以使配置生效
systemctl restart docker
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Latest Docker Compose
DESCRIPTION: Script to automatically fetch and install the latest version of Docker Compose from GitHub.
SOURCE: https://github.com/frozengee/compose/blob/main/[10] Rockchip/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_42

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
COMPOSE_VERSION=`git ls-remote https://github.com/docker/compose | grep refs/tags | grep -oP "[0-9]+\.[0-9][0-9]+\.[0-9]+$" | sort --version-sort | tail -n 1`
sh -c "curl -L https://github.com/docker/compose/releases/download/v${COMPOSE_VERSION}/docker-compose-`uname -s`-`uname -m` > /usr/local/bin/docker-compose"
chmod +x /usr/local/bin/docker-compose
```

TITLE: Replacing APT Sources with Tsinghua Mirrors
DESCRIPTION: Script to backup the default APT sources and replace them with Tsinghua University mirrors for faster package downloads in China. Updates and upgrades packages afterward.
SOURCE: https://github.com/frozengee/compose/blob/main/[10] Rockchip/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
echo "[Info] 正在备份默认apt源..."
cp /etc/apt/sources.list /etc/apt/sources.list.bak
echo "[Info] 正在替换apt源为清华apt源..."
echo deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ bionic main restricted universe multiverse > /etc/apt/sources.list
echo deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ bionic-updates main restricted universe multiverse >> /etc/apt/sources.list
echo deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ bionic-backports main restricted universe multiverse >> /etc/apt/sources.list
echo deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ bionic-security main restricted universe multiverse >> /etc/apt/sources.list
echo "[Info] 正在更新源..."
apt update
echo "[Info] 正在更新软件..."
apt upgrade -y
```

TITLE: Creating Macvlan Network in Docker
DESCRIPTION: Command to create a macvlan network in Docker with specified gateway, subnet, and IPv6 support. Enables containers to have independent IP addresses on the local network.
SOURCE: https://github.com/frozengee/compose/blob/main/compose.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```

```

TITLE: Docker Compose Macvlan Network Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Docker Compose configuration example showing how to set up a container with macvlan networking and custom IP address assignment.
SOURCE: https://github.com/frozengee/compose/blob/main/compose.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: yaml
CODE:
```
services:
  lucky-test:
    image: docker.1panel.live/gdy666/lucky:latest
    container_name: lucky-test
    hostname: lucky-test
    networks:
      br0:
        ipv4_address: 192.168.1.233

networks:
    br0:
      external: true
      name: br0
```

```

echo "[Info] 正在替换apt源为清华apt源..."
echo deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ bionic main restricted universe multiverse > /etc/apt/sources.list
echo deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ bionic-updates main restricted universe multiverse >> /etc/apt/sources.list
echo deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ bionic-backports main restricted universe multiverse >> /etc/apt/sources.list
echo deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ bionic-security main restricted universe multiverse >> /etc/apt/sources.list

TITLE: Uninstalling Old Docker Versions in Debian
DESCRIPTION: This command removes old Docker-related packages to avoid conflicts with a new installation. It uses a for loop to iterate through a list of packages and uninstall them using apt-get.
SOURCE: https://github.com/frozengee/compose/blob/main/docker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
for pkg in docker.io docker-doc docker-compose podman-docker containerd runc; do sudo apt-get remove $pkg; done
```

TITLE: Deploying DPanel Lite Version on Debian/Ubuntu/OMV
DESCRIPTION: Docker run command for the lite version of DPanel on Debian, Ubuntu, or OpenMediaVault systems. Maps only port 8807 since the lite version lacks the domain forwarding functionality, reducing resource usage.
SOURCE: https://github.com/frozengee/compose/blob/main/dpanel.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
docker run -d --name dpanel -p 8807:8080 --name=dpanel --restart=always -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock -v /mnt/docker/dpanel:/dpanel registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/dpanel/dpanel:lite
```

TITLE: Setting Container Resource Limits in Docker Compose
DESCRIPTION: Configuration for limiting container CPU and memory usage. Sets maximum memory usage to 2046M and CPU usage to 4 cores.
SOURCE: https://github.com/frozengee/compose/blob/main/compose.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
    deploy:
      resources:
        limits:
          memory: 2046M
          cpus: '4'
          # 限制容器最多可以使用主机上2个CPU，物理内存最高占用为2g
```

TITLE: Checking VPU/NPU Module Status
DESCRIPTION: Command to check if VPU or NPU kernel modules are loaded in a Rockchip-based system.
SOURCE: https://github.com/frozengee/compose/blob/main/[10] Rockchip/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_47

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
lsmod | grep -E "vpu|npu"
# 检查已加载的内核模块
dmesg | grep -iE "vpu|rkvdec|rkvenc"
# 通过内核日志查看与VPU相关的驱动加载信息，驱动名称如 rkvdec(解码)或 rkvenc(编码)会显示在日志中
cat /sys/class/vpu/vpu/version

apt update && sudo apt install -y clinfo && clinfo
# 用 clinfo 检查主机上的 OpenCL (GPU 固件)
docker exec -it jellyfin /usr/lib/jellyfin-ffmpeg/ffmpeg -v debug -init_hw_device rkmpp=rk -init_hw_device opencl=ocl@rk
# 要验证 OpenCL 运行时在 docker 容器内是否正常工作，您可以运行此命令，第一个 jellyfin 为容器名字
# watch -n 1 cat /sys/kernel/debug/rkrga/load
# 视频转码时，使用命令检查RGA引擎的占用情况
```

TITLE: Updating Dify to Latest Version
DESCRIPTION: A sequence of commands to update an existing Dify installation to the latest version by stopping containers, pulling new code and images, and restarting the services.
SOURCE: https://github.com/frozengee/compose/blob/main/[06] 特殊版本/15.dify-生成式 AI 应用创新引擎/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_15

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
cd dify/dify
docker-compose down
git pull origin main
docker-compose pull
docker-compose up -d
```

COMPOSE_VERSION=`git ls-remote https://github.com/docker/compose | grep refs/tags | grep -oP "[0-9]+\.[0-9][0-9]+\.[0-9]+$" | sort --version-sort | tail -n 1`

LANGUAGE: bash

#- 终端命令添加 Docker 镜像加速
#- 以部分镜像加速为例
#- 以下是一整条命令，一起复制到终端运行

TITLE: 部署dpanel Docker管理器
DESCRIPTION: 使用Docker命令部署dpanel管理工具，用于通过Web界面管理Docker容器。配置了持久存储、端口映射和自动重启选项。

```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: 存储设备管理和挂载配置
DESCRIPTION: 完整的存储设备管理流程，包括识别设备、分区、格式化、挂载和配置开机自动挂载。适用于香橙派5Plus上的EMMC和SSD设备。
SOURCE: https://github.com/frozengee/compose/blob/main/[10] Rockchip/02.香橙派5plus/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_12

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
lsblk
fdisk -l
# 得知 EMMC为/dev/mmcblk0，SSD为/dev/nvme0n1
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
lsblk | grep mmcblk0
lsblk | grep nvme0n1
# 得知EMMC和SSD分区情况
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
fdisk /dev/mmcblk0
fdisk /dev/nvme0n1
# 在fdisk命令行界面中，执行以下操作：
# 输入 p 查看现有分区
# 输入 d 删除分区，根据提示选择要删除的分区编号
# 重复删除所有分区
# 输入 w 保存更改并退出
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
fdisk /dev/mmcblk0
fdisk /dev/nvme0n1
# 在fdisk命令行界面中，执行以下操作：
# 输入 n 创建新分区
# 选择 p 创建主分区
# 按回车键，接受默认的起始扇区
# 按回车键，接受默认的结束扇区(使用全部存储空间)
# 输入 w 保存更改并退出
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
mkfs.ext4 /dev/mmcblk0p1
mkfs.ext4 /dev/nvme0n1
# 以上为格式化分区为ext4

mkfs.btrfs /dev/mmcblk0p1
mkfs.btrfs /dev/nvme0n1
# 以上为格式化分区为Btrfs
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
parted /dev/mmcblk0 print
parted /dev/nvme0n1 print
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
mkdir /mnt/emmc
mkdir /mnt/ssd
# 将分别挂载到 /mnt 下的 /emmc 和 /ssd 路径
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
mount /dev/mmcblk0p1 /mnt/emmc
mount /dev/nvme0n1 /mnt/ssd
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
df -h | grep emmc
df -h | grep ssd
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
blkid /dev/mmcblk0p1 | awk -F'UUID="' '{print $2}' | awk -F'"' '{print $1}'
blkid /dev/nvme0n1 | awk -F'UUID="' '{print $2}' | awk -F'"' '{print $1}'
# EMMC 为 32e6dc02-4e27-4ad0-99c5-b4c0b97cf263
# SSD  为 e1e08765-8e5b-4a2d-957e-96a34855b674
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
nano /etc/fstab
# 文本末端添加以下内容，然后推出并保存(按ctrl+X，Y，回车键)
UUID=32e6dc02-4e27-4ad0-99c5-b4c0b97cf263 /mnt/emmc ext4 defaults 0 0
# 开机自动挂载EMMC
UUID=e1e08765-8e5b-4a2d-957e-96a34855b674 /mnt/ssd ext4 defaults 0 0
# 开机自动挂载SSD
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
mount -a
# 测试自动挂载，若无报错即配置成功
df -h | grep emmc
df -h | grep ssd
# 验证挂载状态
```

TITLE: Explaining Jspace Docker Path Structure in Shell
DESCRIPTION: Details the highly complex Docker configuration paths for Jspace systems. Shows the paths based on storage types (SSD/HDD), phone numbers as identifiers, and multiple path notation options. Includes critique of the system's reliance on phone numbers for path structure.
SOURCE: https://github.com/frozengee/compose/blob/main/volumes.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
💡极空间系统的docker compose文件目录存放路径
/zspace/applications/services/zdocker/config/compose_config/项目名字.yaml

💡极空间系统的docker容器配置文件目录存放路径
/tmp/zfsv3/sata$/手机号码/data/docker/aaa
/tmp/zfsv3/nvme$/手机号码/data/docker/aaa
/tmp/zfsv3/sata$/手机号码+字母/data/docker/aaa
/tmp/zfsv3/nvme$/手机号码+字母/data/docker/aaa

另一种书写格式，其中开头的data_n001为第一个存储池，如此类推，不推荐使用该写法
/data_n001/data/udata/real/手机号码/docker/aaa
/data_n001/data/udata/real/手机号码+字母/docker/aaa
----------
💡极空间系统的数据目录存放路径开头
/tmp/zfsv3/sata$/手机号码/data/bbb
/tmp/zfsv3/nvme$/手机号码/data/bbb
/tmp/zfsv3/sata$/手机号码+字母/data/bbb
/tmp/zfsv3/nvme$/手机号码+字母/data/bbb

另一种书写格式，其中开头的data_n001为第一个存储池，如此类推，不推荐使用该写法
/data_n001/data/udata/real/手机号码/bbb
/data_n001/data/udata/real/手机号码+字母/bbb

"nvme$"和"sata$" 根据自己实际情况修改，$为数字；"手机号码"为个人手机号码，也可以选择使用另一种书写格式，但绕不开路径用手机号，真他妈恶心
如果你有第二台极空间，并且用同一个手机号绑定注册(强制联网激活机器)，则为需要在手机号码后添加上a-z的字母
例如：1688888888，1688888888a，1688888888b，1688888888c，这样类推，所以同一个手机号极限是多少？27个？

由于每个人的硬盘类别不一样，手机号为个人隐私，因为无法写出现成模板，[全通用]的模板可以使用
```

TITLE: Configuring Docker Registry Mirrors in China
DESCRIPTION: Sets up Docker to use multiple Chinese mirror repositories to accelerate image downloads. The script creates a new daemon.json configuration file and restarts the Docker service.
SOURCE: https://github.com/frozengee/compose/blob/main/[06] 特殊版本/15.dify-生成式 AI 应用创新引擎/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# 清空 /etc/docker/daemon.json 文件，准备写入新内容
echo >/etc/docker/daemon.json

# 使用 cat 命令将以下内容写入 /etc/docker/daemon.json 文件
# 配置 Docker 镜像加速器，使用多个镜像源来提高镜像下载速度
cat >/etc/docker/daemon.json <<EOF
{
"registry-mirrors": [
"https://docker.1panel.live",
"https://k-docker.asia",
"https://docker.1ms.run"
]
}
EOF

# 重启 Docker 服务以使配置生效
systemctl restart docker
```

SOURCE: https://github.com/frozengee/compose/blob/main/[10] Rockchip/02.香橙派5plus/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
uname -srm
hostnamectl | grep -i kernel
cat /proc/version
# 以上三条均可
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```

```

TITLE: Adding Docker Repository to Debian Sources
DESCRIPTION: This complex command adds the official Docker APT repository to the system's sources list. It determines the system architecture and Debian version automatically.
SOURCE: https://github.com/frozengee/compose/blob/main/docker.md#2025-04-22_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
echo \
  "deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/docker.asc] https://download.docker.com/linux/debian \
  $(. /etc/os-release && echo \"$VERSION_CODENAME\") stable" | \
  sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list > /dev/null
# 更新
sudo apt-get update
```

TITLE: 替换Ubuntu apt源为清华大学镜像源
DESCRIPTION: 此脚本备份原apt源配置，并将apt源替换为清华大学镜像源，之后更新软件包列表和升级已安装的软件包。适用于Ubuntu Bionic(18.04)版本。
SOURCE: https://github.com/frozengee/compose/blob/main/[10] Rockchip/01.友善cm3588/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
echo "[Info] 正在备份默认apt源..."
cp /etc/apt/sources.list /etc/apt/sources.list.bak
echo "[Info] 正在替换apt源为清华apt源..."
echo deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ bionic main restricted universe multiverse > /etc/apt/sources.list
echo deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ bionic-updates main restricted universe multiverse >> /etc/apt/sources.list
echo deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ bionic-backports main restricted universe multiverse >> /etc/apt/sources.list
echo deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ bionic-security main restricted universe multiverse >> /etc/apt/sources.list
echo "[Info] 正在更新源..."
apt update
echo "[Info] 正在更新软件..."
apt upgrade -y
```

cp /etc/apt/sources.list /etc/apt/sources.list.bak

echo deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ bionic main restricted universe multiverse > /etc/apt/sources.list
echo deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ bionic-updates main restricted universe multiverse >> /etc/apt/sources.list
echo deb https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/ubuntu/ bionic-backports main restricted universe multiverse >> /etc/apt/sources.list

echo "[Info] 正在更新源..."
